name: ice-hammer
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers user’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
